com.android.internal.policy.impl.keyguard

Interface ChallengeLayout

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MultiPaneChallengeLayout, SlidingChallengeLayout

    public interface ChallengeLayout
    Interface implemented by ViewGroup-derived layouts that implement special logic for presenting security challenges to the user.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  ChallengeLayout.OnBouncerStateChangedListener
      Listener interface that reports changes in bouncer state.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getBouncerAnimationDuration()
      Returns the duration of the bounce animation.
      void hideBouncer()
      Hide the bouncer challenge if it is currently showing.
      boolean isBouncing()
      Returns true if the challenge is currently in bouncer mode, potentially blocking access to other child views.
      boolean isChallengeOverlapping() 
      boolean isChallengeShowing() 
      void setOnBouncerStateChangedListener(ChallengeLayout.OnBouncerStateChangedListener listener)
      Set a listener that will respond to changes in bouncer state.
      void showBouncer()
      Show the bouncer challenge.
      void showChallenge(boolean b)
      Show or hide the challenge layout.

    • Method Detail

      • isChallengeShowing

        boolean isChallengeShowing()
        Returns:
        true if the security challenge area of this layout is currently visible

      • isChallengeOverlapping

        boolean isChallengeOverlapping()
        Returns:
        true if the challenge area significantly overlaps other content

      • showChallenge

        void showChallenge(boolean b)
        Show or hide the challenge layout. If you want to show the challenge layout in bouncer mode where applicable, use showBouncer() instead.
        Parameters:
        b - true to show, false to hide

      • showBouncer

        void showBouncer()
        Show the bouncer challenge. This may block access to other child views.

      • hideBouncer

        void hideBouncer()
        Hide the bouncer challenge if it is currently showing. This may restore previously blocked access to other child views.

      • isBouncing

        boolean isBouncing()
        Returns true if the challenge is currently in bouncer mode, potentially blocking access to other child views.

      • getBouncerAnimationDuration

        int getBouncerAnimationDuration()
        Returns the duration of the bounce animation.

      • setOnBouncerStateChangedListener

        void setOnBouncerStateChangedListener(ChallengeLayout.OnBouncerStateChangedListener listener)
        Set a listener that will respond to changes in bouncer state.
        Parameters:
        listener - listener to register
